description: I have truly fond memories of spending entire days playing rally games on the original PlayStation, and some later games on PC and Old School Rally really looks the part.
title: Old School Rally plans full support for Steam Deck - got me feeling nostalgic

description: Dwarf Fortress on Steam and itch.io has been a mega success for Bay 12 Games, a deserved success, given their previous free release supported and updated for a long time. Now the developers have confirmed it's closing in on a million sales.
title: Dwarf Fortress hits 800,000 sales and no sign of it stopping

description: Discover Overlay, an open source Discord Overlay for Linux has a new release available with v0.7.3 adding in some useful new features.
title: Discord Overlay for Linux adds PulseAudio / PipeWire integration

description: You may have seen news recently about explicit sync for Wayland, but you might not know why it's actually important for the future of Linux on Wayland.
title: KDE's Xaver Hugl on why Wayland explicit sync is such a big deal

description: More work is ongoing for the upcoming KDE Plasma 6.1 release, and there's some fun stuff being added like the ability to sync your keyboard RGB lighting up to your Plasma accent colouring.
title: KDE Plasma 6.1 will be able to sync keyboard RGB to your chosen accent colour

description: Want a really simple but useful launcher to run GZDoom games? If you find other launchers not to your liking, or too complicated, maybe CleanDoom will be what you need.
title: CleanDoom - a modern, polished mod launcher for GZDoom

description: Windowkill is a fantastic twin-stick shooter, where the game window is constantly shrinking on you and enemies spawn across multiple windows. It's truly clever and now it has full customization available via the newly introduced modding support.
title: The ridiculously fun Windowkill gets modding support with a source code release

description: The Orange Pi NEO is an exciting looking gaming device, following in the footsteps of the Steam Deck being powered by Linux. Recently the price was revealed, and the Manjaro Linux head Philip Müller did a talk on it.
title: Check out the Manjaro Linux lead talk about the Orange Pi NEO gaming handheld

description: Nice to see more Linux distributions make changes to ensure the gaming experience is good. Arch Linux is now following Fedora and Ubuntu on upping the vm.max_map_count value.
title: Arch Linux changes vm.max_map_count to match Fedora, Ubuntu for better gaming

description: After the most recent main release of the Heroic Games Launcher, there was an issue people found where games using Proton on Linux / Steam Deck wouldn't run. This latest hotfix should solve it.
title: Heroic Games Launcher v2.14.1 Hotfix #1 fixes Proton on Linux and Steam Deck
